words.def: a word that is composed of parts from different languages (e.g., `monolingual' has a Greek prefix and a Latin root)
warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrates characterized by feathers and forelimbs modified as wings
a small indefinite quantity (especially of a liquid)
a reformer who opposes the use of intoxicating beverages
prevent from being seen or discovered
(ethnic slur) offensive term for a Jew
an authoritative direction or instruction to do something
One of the small bones in the knee joints of sheep uniting the bones above and below the joints.
support resembling the rib of an animal
so as to pass a given point
a heavy brittle diamagnetic trivalent metallic element (resembles arsenic and antimony chemically)
a state in the Rocky Mountains
